description:
If you're a fan of Cody Cummings, we're sure you've seen him push his straight limits when he's with guys. You've seen him get his cock sucked, his ass licked, and even a few lucky guys got to cum on him, but there's one thing you've never seen this hunk do, and that's kiss another guy...until today.

Rod Daily owed Cody a BJ for a bet that he had lost a few days ago, but since Cody isn't really into guys, he has a hard time keeping it up when he's getting sucked by a man mouth. Luck for him, Rod came prepared; He brought his best girlfriend Brittany Amber to join in on the fun. There was just one stipulation for Cody before he could hook up with her: He had to kiss Rod.

To see what kinky stuff happens in this amazing Cody Cummings scene, check it out!

Enjoy!
title: The Bet
